question: in the honour of which god is anant chaturdashi celebrated
api_result: Anant Chaturdashi is primarily celebrated in honor of Lord Vishnu. On this day, devotees worship Lord Vishnu in his eternal form of Anant (infinite) to seek his blessings for prosperity and to remove suffering. The festival involves the ritual of tying a sacred thread as a symbol of devotion and prayer to Lord Vishnu.
